items.title: UnitedHealth director Kristen Gil buys 3,700 shares of company stock
items.description: UnitedHealth (UNH) director Kristen Gil on Thursday bought 3,700 shares of the company’s stock at an average price of $271.17 per share. Following the filing, Gil own 5,369 common shares of the company, with 1,551 shares held directly and 3,818 controlled indirectly. Shares of UnitedHealth are up 0.4% to $275.10.
